metadata.dataset_type: Validated Benchmark Dataset with Full Source Documentation

tier_2_validated.name: Literature-Validated Synthetic
tier_2_validated.description: Synthetic data based on published performance studies

documentation_requirements: Every data point must have clear source attribution
Real vs synthetic data must be explicitly labeled
API endpoints and collection methods must be documented
Literature sources for synthetic data must be cited
Quality ratings must be consistently applied
validation_approach: Cross-validate synthetic data against real data where available
Document all assumptions and limitations clearly
Provide uncertainty estimates for all benchmarks

REAL_DATA.definition: Data collected directly from operational APIs with government/agency backing
validation_criteria: Direct API access with official endpoints
Traceable to physical monitoring stations or operational models

ENHANCED_SYNTHETIC.definition: Scientifically-generated data based on documented model performance
validation_criteria: Uses documented error patterns and biases
Calibrated against real data where available
